pathInitiate.title:
Path of the §bInitiate§7 
+1 To all schools of magic

hardy.title:
§7§a[Hardy]§7
When taking damage, gain regeneration for a duration equal to the damage received.

initiateSlowfall.title:
§7§a[Innate Slowfall]§7
When falling long distances you gain Slow Falling.

fervour.title:
§7§a[Fervour]§7
Landing a killing blow grants you haste for a short duration.

wayfarerStealth.title:
§7§a[Stealth]§7 
Gain Stealth when crouching. 

§f(Stealth)§7 causes you to blend into the shadows, avoiding monster detection completely. Dealing or Receiving damage removes stealth.

wayfarerReflexive.title:
§7§a[Reflexive]§7 
When your Stealth is forcefully broken, you have a chance to trigger the Rogue Evasion Mastery signature ability.

wayfarerUnseen.title:
§7§a[Unseen]§7 
While loading a Crossbow, gain momentary Stealth.

wayfarerGuarding.title:
§7§a[Guarding]§7 
While you have a Crossbow in your offhand, you periodically gain Barrier.

§f(Barrier)§7 The next damage you take is completely negated.

initiateNullification.title:
§7§a[Nullification]§7 
Periodically strip buffs from nearby hostiles.

initiateGambit.title:
§7§a[Gambit]§7 
Your spell damage is reduced by 25%, but your spell critical damage is increased by 75%.

initiateEmpower.title:
§7§a[Empower]§7 
Chance on spell cast to gain a stack of Attunement.

§f(Attunement)§7 Increases spell damage for a specific school of magic by 5% per stack.

initiateAttuned.title:
§7§a[Attuned]§7 
When you have 5 or more stacks of attunement, periodically convert them into stacks of Precision.

§f(Precision)§7 Increases spell critical damage and critical chance by 5% per stack.

initiateLightningRod.title:
§7§a[Lightning Rod]§7 
During storms, you periodically gain stacks of Lightning Attunement.

§f(Lightning Attunement)§7 Increases spell damage for lightning magic by 5% per stack.

initiateEldritchEnfeeblement.title:
§7§a[Eldritch Enfeeblement]§7 
Your spell damage is increased by 20%, but your movespeed is decreased by 30%.

initiateHasty.title:
§7§a[Hasty]§7 
Your movespeed is increased by 20%, but you are inflicted with immobilize when taking damage. 

§f(Immobilize)§7 greatly slows and damages the victim when they attempt to move.

initiatePerilousPrecision.title:
§7§a[Perilous Precision]§7 
Your spell critical chance is increased by 10%, but your max health is reduced by 20%.

cleric.title:
§7§a[Cleric]§7 
Periodically cleanse debuffs from nearby allies.

rangerTamer.title:
§7§a[Tamer]§7 
When your pets are near to you, they gain Regeneration & Resistance.

rangerBonded.title:
§7§a[Bonded]§7 
When your pets are near to you and are more healthy than you, they exchange their health with you. Can only trigger when your pet is above 30% HP.

rangerTrained.title:
§7§a[Trained]§7 
When your pets are near to you and have at least 70% HP, they gain Strength & Speed.

rangerIncognito.title:
§7§a[Incognito]§7 
When your pets are near to you and you gain Stealth, they also gain Stealth.

rogueBackstab.title:
§7§a[Backstab]§7 
Attacking enemies from behind inflicts them with weakness.
Also, whilst in proximity to weakened enemies, you have a chance to gain Stealth for a short duration.

warriorHeavyArmorMastery.title:
§7§a[Heavy Armor Mastery]§7 
While your armor value is above 15, you have a chance to gain Strength when hit.

warriorMediumArmorMastery.title:
§7§a[Medium Armor Mastery]§7 
While your armor value is below 15, you have a chance to gain Absorption when hit.

warriorSpellbreaker.title:
§7§a[Spellbreaker]§7 
When taking damage, you have a chance to gain Spellbreaking for a short duration.

§f(Spellbreaking)§7 causes hostile spell projectiles to explode when in close proximity to you.

warriorGoliath.title:
§7§a[Goliath]§7 
When falling long distances, gain Earthshaker.

§f(Earthshaker)§7 causes you to damage and knockback surrounding enemies when landing on the ground. This damage scales with your armor value.

warriorHeavyWeight.title:
§7§a[Heavy Weight]§7 
Your Earthshaker effects are enhanced, causing them to deal additional damage the longer you are in the air.

warriorDeathDefy.title:
§7§a[Death Defy]§7 
When at low HP, you gain Regeneration and Exhaustion relative to your remaining health percent. 

§f(Exhaustion)§7 reduces your Melee Attack and Attack Speed by 1% per stack.

warriorFrenzy.title:
§7§a[Frenzy]§7 
Gain 75% increased Melee Damage, but each time you hit an enemy you gain a stack of exhaustion. 

§f(Exhaustion)§7 reduces your Melee Attack and Attack Speed by 1% per stack.

berserkerSwordMastery.title:
§7§a[Sword Mastery]§7 
Gain pulsing Speed when wielding a sword in your mainhand.

berserkerSwordMasteryProficient.title:
§7§a[Sword Mastery +]§7 
Gain increased pulsing Speed when wielding a sword in your mainhand.

berserkerSwordMasterySkilled.title:
§7§a[Sword Mastery ++]§7 
When not dual wielding, gain pulsing Might.

§f(Might)§7 grants 25% increased attack damage per stack.

berserkerAxeMastery.title:
§7§a[Axe Mastery]§7 
Gain pulsing strength when wielding an axe in your mainhand.

berserkerAxeMasteryProficient.title:
§7§a[Axe Mastery +]§7 
Gain increased pulsing strength when wielding an axe in your mainhand.

berserkerAxeMasterySkilled.title:
§7§a[Axe Mastery ++]§7 
Gain increased pulsing strength when wielding an axe in your mainhand.

berserkerIgnorePain.title:
§7§a[Ignore Pain]§7 
When your HP drops below 40% you gain pulsing resistance.

berserkerIgnorePainProficient.title:
§7§a[Ignore Pain +]§7 
When your HP drops below 40% you gain increased pulsing resistance.

berserkerIgnorePainSkilled.title:
§7§a[Ignore Pain ++]§7 
When your HP drops below 40% you gain increased pulsing resistance.

berserkerRecklessness.title:
§7§a[Recklessness]§7 
When your HP rises above 70% you are inflicted with pulsing weakness.

berserkerChallenge.title:
§7§a[Challenge]§7 
Gain a stack of haste for each nearby enemy.

berserkerExploit.title:
§7§a[Exploit]§7 
Hitting immobilized enemies inflicts them with weakness.

bulwarkShieldMastery.title:
§7§a[Shield Mastery]§7 
Gain weakness & resistance when wielding a shield.

bulwarkShieldMasteryProficient.title:
§7§a[Shield Mastery +]§7 
Gain weakness & increased resistance when wielding a shield.

bulwarkShieldMasterySkilled.title:
§7§a[Shield Mastery ++]§7 
Gain weakness & increased resistance when wielding a shield.

bulwarkRebuke.title:
§7§a[Rebuke]§7 
25% Chance on block to inflict your attacker with weakness.

wayfarerSlender.title:
§7§a[Slender]§7 
When you have 15 or more armor, you are inflicted with Slowness

rogueSmokeBomb.title:
§7§a[Smoke Bomb]§7 
Chance to blind nearby enemies and gain Immobilizing Aura when hit.

§f(Immobilizing Aura)§7 periodically inflicts nearby enemies with Immobilize.

rogueOpportunisticMastery.title:
§7§a[Opportunistic Mastery]§7 
Attacking while under the effects of Stealth causes you to poison your target for a short duration.

rogueOpportunisticMasteryProficient.title:
§7§a[Opportunistic Mastery +]§7 
Attacking while under the effects of Stealth causes you to poison your target for a moderate duration.

rogueOpportunisticMasterySkilled.title:
§7§a[Opportunistic Mastery ++]§7 
Attacking while under the effects of Stealth causes you to poison your target for a long duration.

rogueEvasionMastery.title:
§7§a[Evasion Mastery]§7 
When below the armor threshold of the Wayfarer Slender passive, you have a 15% Chance to completely avoid incoming damage.

rogueEvasionMasteryProficient.title:
§7§a[Evasion Mastery +]§7 
When below the armor threshold of the Wayfarer Slender passive, you have a 20% Chance to completely avoid incoming damage.

rogueEvasionMasterySkilled.title:
§7§a[Evasion Mastery ++]§7 
When below the armor threshold of the Wayfarer Slender passive, you have a 25% Chance to completely avoid incoming damage.

rogueExploitation.title:
§7§a[Exploitation]§7 
While under the effects of stealth, your back attacks inflict Death Mark.

rogueRecovery.title:
§7§a[Recovery]§7 
When you gain Stealth, you also gain Regeneration.

rogueShadowVeil.title:
§7§a[Shadow Veil]§7 
While under the effects of Stealth, you periodically gain increasing Resistance.

rogueDeflection.title:
§7§a[Deflection]§7 
When dual wielding weapons §f(axes do not count)§7, the base evasion chance of your Evasion Mastery passive is increased by 10%.

rogueFleetfooted.title:
§7§a[Fleetfooted]§7 
When you are forcefully removed from Stealth, you gain momentary Speed.

initiateFrail.title:
§7§a[Frail]§7 
When you have 10 or more armor, you are inflicted with Slowness. Also, you cannot effectively use weapons with more than 6 Attack Power.

spellbladeWeaponExpert.title:
§7§a[Weapon Expert]§7 
You are no longer penalised for using high damage weapons due to the Initiate Frail passive.

spellbladeSpellweaving.title:
§7§a[Spellweaving]§7 
You now have a 15% chance to summon a random spell when you hit an enemy.

spellbladeSignatureElementalSurge.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Elemental Surge]§7 
Grants you Elemental Surge for 15s. 

§f(Elemental Surge)§7 causes you to periodically release elemental novas.

§a30s Cooldown§7

spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeNoFrost.title:
§7Removes Frost Novas from your §6[Elemental Surge]§7 spell pool.
If no elements remain in the spell pool, Elemental Surge will instead release Arcane Novas.

spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeNoFire.title:
§7Removes Fire Novas from your §6[Elemental Surge]§7 spell pool.
If no elements remain in the spell pool, Elemental Surge will instead release Arcane Novas.

spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeRenewal.title: §7Hitting enemies while you have §6[Elemental Surge]§7 has a 15% chance to extend the its duration by 3 seconds.

spellbladeSignatureElementalSurgeNoLight.title:
§7Removes Lightning Novas from your §6[Elemental Surge]§7 spell pool.
If no elements remain in the spell pool, Elemental Surge will instead release Arcane Novas.

spellbladeSignatureElementalImpact.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Elemental Impact]§7 
Causes you to dash forward with extreme power, releasing elemental explosions as you move.

§a30s Cooldown§7

spellbladeSignatureElementalImpactMagnet.title: §7Your §6[Elemental Impact]§7 now pulls nearby enemies into the path of impact.

spellbladeSignatureElementalImpactResist.title: §7Your §6[Elemental Impact]§7 now also grants you brief resistance.

spellbladeSignatureSpellweaver.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Spellweaver]§7 
Doubles the chance of your Spellweaving passive for 25s.

§a40s Cooldown§7

spellbladeSignatureSpellweaverHaste.title: §7Your Spellweaving procs now grant you 5s of Haste stacking up to 5 times.

spellbladeSignatureSpellweaverRegenerati.title: §7Your Spellweaving procs now have a 50% chance to grant you regeneration for 5s.

wizardPassiveSpellEcho.title:
§7§a[Spell Echo]§7 
Your spell hits have a chance to echo, casting an additional random spell at the target.

wizardSignatureMeteorShower.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Meteor Shower]§7 
Calls down meteors on nearby enemies.

§a40s Cooldown§7

wizardSignatureMeteorShowerGreater.title: §7§6[Meteor Shower]§7 Now summons a single larger meteor that deals significantly more damage in a larger area.

wizardSignatureMeteorShowerWrath.title:
§7Casting §6[Meteor Shower]§7 now grants you 10 stacks of Meteoric Wrath. 
 
§f(Meteoric Wrath)§7 periodically summons meteors above nearby enemies.

wizardSignatureMeteorShowerRenewingWrath.title: §7When Meteoric Wrath triggers it has a 10% chance to not consume a stack.
§7When Meteoric Wrath triggers it has a 30% chance to not consume a stack.
§7When Meteoric Wrath triggers it has a 50% chance to not consume a stack.

wizardSignatureIceComet.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Ice Comet]§7 
Calls down an Ice Comet that deals damage to and slows enemies in a large radius.

§a30s Cooldown§7

wizardSignatureIceCometLeap.title: §7Casting §6[Ice Comet]§7 now causes you to leap backwards and gain momentary slow falling.

wizardSignatureIceCometVolley.title:
§7Casting §6[Ice Comet]§7 now grants you 6 stacks of frost volley. 
 
§f(Frost Volley)§7 causes you to periodically summon Frost Bolts at nearby or targeted enemies.

wizardSignatureIceCometDamage+.title: §7§6[Ice Comet]§7 Is now larger and deals more damage & knockback.

wizardSignatureIceCometDamage++.title: §7§6[Ice Comet]§7 Is now larger and deals much more damage & knockback.

wizardSignatureIceCometDamage+++.title: §7§6[Ice Comet]§7 Is now larger and deals significantly more damage & knockback.

wizardSignatureStaticDischarge.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Static Discharge]§7 
Releases a high damage electrical discharge at your target, inflicting them with weakness.

§a35s Cooldown§7

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLeap.title: §7Your §6[Discharge]§7 can now leap between nearby enemies up to 8 times.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLeap++.title: §7Your §6[Static Discharge]§7 can now leap between nearby enemies up to 16 times.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeLeap+++.title: §7Your §6[Static Discharge]§7 can now leap between nearby enemies up to 24 times.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeSpeed.title: §7Each time §6[Static Discharge]§7 leaps or is cast, you have a 5% chance to gain speed.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeSpeed++.title: §7Each time §6[Static Discharge]§7 leaps or is cast, you have a 10% chance to gain speed.

wizardSignatureStaticDischargeSpeed+++.title: §7Each time §6[Static Discharge]§7 leaps or is cast, you have a 15% chance to gain speed.

wizardSignatureArcaneBolt.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Arcane Bolt]§7 
Fires a concentrated bolt of arcane energy at your target.

§a35s Cooldown§7

wizardSignatureArcaneBoltLesser.title: §7Your §6[Arcane Bolt]§7 now fires multiple Lesser Arcane Bolts in a larger area. These bolts move faster and have less damage.

wizardSignatureArcaneBoltVolley.title:
§7Casting §6[Arcane Bolt]§7 now grants you 10 stacks of Arcane Volley. 
 
§f(Arcane Volley)§7 causes you to rapidly cast Lesser Arcane Bolts at targeted enemies.

wizardSignatureArcaneBoltGreater.title:
§7You now cast a §6[Greater Arcane Bolt]§7 that deals increased damage. 
 
This does not affect Lesser Arcane Bolts.

shamanSignatureAstralTotem.title:
Signature Ability: §6[Astral Totem]§7 Summon a Totem that periodically casts elemental comets on nearby enemies.

§a30s Cooldown§7

shamanSignatureNovaTotem.title:
Signature Ability: §6[Nova Totem]§7 Summon a Totem that periodically casts elemental novas.

§a30s Cooldown§7

shamanSignatureBoltTotem.title:
Signature Ability: §6[Bolt Totem]§7 Summon a Totem that periodically fires elemental bolts at nearby enemies.

§a30s Cooldown§7

rogueSignatureEvasion.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Evasion]§7 
The effects of your Evasion Mastery passive are doubled for 8s.

§a30s Cooldown§7

rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBlades.title:
§7§6[Evasion]§7 Now also grants you 10 stacks of Fan of Blades.

§f(Fan of Blades)§7 causes you to throw daggers at enemies in front of you.

rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesDisencha.title:
§7Your Fan of Blades now also inflict enemies with Disenchantment.

§f(Disenchantment)§7 periodically strips buffs from the victim.

rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesAssault.title: §7You now gain 20 stacks of Fan of Blades with increased throw frequency but decreased damage.

rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBladesRenewal.title: §7Gain two stacks of Fan of Blades on kill.

rogueSignaturePreparation.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Preparation]§7 
Gain Stealth and Speed 3 for 8s.

§a15s Cooldown§7

rogueSignaturePreparationShadowstrike.title: §7§6[Preparation]§7 now causes you to dash forward at lightning speed, dealing mainhand damage to enemies in your path.

rogueSignaturePreparationShadowstrikeVam.title: §7You steal buffs from enemies caught within the path of your dash.

rogueSignaturePreparationShadowstrikeBol.title: §7When dashing forward you cast Lesser Soul Bolts at enemies in your path.

rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikes.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Siphoning Strikes]§7 
Gain 10 stacks of Siphoning Strikes.

§f(Siphoning Strikes)§7 causes you to siphon health health and strip buffs from your enemies on hit.

§a30s Cooldown§7

rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikesMighty.title:
§7When you gain §6[Siphoning Strikes]§7 you also gain Might.

§f(Might)§7 grants 25% increased attack damage per stack.

rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikesAura.title:
§7When you gain §6[Siphoning Strikes]§7 you also gain Immobilizing Aura.

§f(Immobilizing Aura)§7 periodically inflicts nearby enemies with Immobilize.

rogueSignatureSiphoningStrikesVanish.title: §7Your §6[Siphoning Strikes]§7 also cleanse you of all stacks of Revealed on hit.

rangerSignatureArrowRain.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Arrow Rain]§7 
Gain one stack of Arrow Rain. 
 
§f(Arrow Rain)§7 causes your next fully-charged bow attack will summon a rain of arrows at the targeted area.

§a35s Cooldown§7

rangerSignatureArrowRainElemental.title: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 is now elementally enhanced and deals additional elemental damage.

rangerSignatureArrowRainEplosive.title: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now leaves behind proximity explosive arrows.

rangerSignatureArrowRainVolley+.title: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now fires one additional volley.

rangerSignatureArrowRainVolley++.title: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now fires two additional volleys.

rangerSignatureArrowRainVolley+++.title: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now fires three additional volleys.

rangerSignatureDisengage.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Disengage]§7 
Slow nearby enemies and leap backwards.

§a15s Cooldown§7

rangerSignatureDisengageRecuperate.title: §7§6[Disengage]§7 now heals all nearby pets to full health.

rangerSignatureDisengageExploitation.title:
§7§6[Disengage]§7 now grants all nearby pets Immobilizing Aura for a short duration. 

§f(Immobilizing Aura)§7 periodically inflicts nearby enemies with Immobilize.

rangerSignatureDisengageMarksman.title:
§7§6[Disengage]§7 now grants you a stack of Marksman. 

§f(Marksman)§7 Causes your next fully charged ranged attack to fire a marksman arrow, dealing high damage and inflicting the target with Death Mark. 

§f(Death Mark)§7 Reduces the victims resistance and healing by 25% per stack.

rangerSignatureElementalArrows.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Elemental Arrows]§7 
Gain 5 stacks of Elemental Arrows.

§a45s Cooldown§7

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsFrostAttun.title: §7Your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 will always be frost attuned.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsFireAttune.title: §7Your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 will always be fire attuned.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsLightningA.title: §7Your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 will always be lightning attuned.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRadius+.title: §7The radius of your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 is increased by 2.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRadius++.title: §7The radius of your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 is increased by 4.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRadius+++.title: §7The radius of your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 is increased by 6.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsStacks+.title: §7You gain one additional stack of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsStacks++.title: §7You gain two additional stacks of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsStacks+++.title: §7You gain three additional stacks of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.

rangerSignatureElementalArrowsRenewal.title: §7You have a 35% chance on kill to gain a stack of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.

necromancerSignatureEnrage.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Enrage]§7 
Send nearby minions into a frenzy, granting them speed, strength and resistance.

§a30s Cooldown§7

necromancerSignatureSacrifice.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Sacrifice]§7 
Sacrifice nearby minions, gaining a stack of strength, haste, and resistance for each minion sacrificed.

§a30s Cooldown§7

necromancerSignatureSpectralGrasp.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Spectral Grasp]§7 
Damage your target and pull them towards you, inflicting them with slowness & mining fatigue.

§a30s Cooldown§7

frostguardSignatureConjuringStrikes.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Conjuring Strikes]§7 
Gain 6 stacks of Conjuring Strikes.

§a30s Cooldown§7

frostguardSignatureFrostNova.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Frost Nova]§7 
Release a Frost Nova, damaging and slowing nearby enemies.

§a30s Cooldown§7

frostguardSignatureIceBlock.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Ice Block]§7 
Gain Ice Block for 6s.

§a30s Cooldown§7

crusaderSignatureConsecration.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Consecration]§7 
Gain Consecration for 15s.

§a30s Cooldown§7

crusaderSignatureStubborn.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Stubborn]§7 
Heal yourself to full and gain resistance for 5s.

§a30s Cooldown§7

crusaderSignatureWarbanner.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Warbanner]§7 
Summon a Warbanner that periodically damages nearby enemies with fire spells and heals nearby allies.

§a30s Cooldown§7

clericSignatureRestoration.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Restoration]§7 
Release a healing nova, healing you and nearby allies whilst granting absorption.

§a30s Cooldown§7

clericSignatureDivineIntervention.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Divine Intervention]§7 
Gain Divine Intervention for 10s.

§a30s Cooldown§7

clericSignatureDivineAscent.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Divine Ascent]§7 
Rise towards the heavens, gaining resistance, regeneration, and levitation for 8s.

§a30s Cooldown§7

berserkerSignatureRampage.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Rampage]§7 
Gain Rampage for 15s.

§f(Rampage)§7 grants you random buffs each time you take damage.

§a30s Cooldown§7

berserkerSignatureRampageCharge.title: §7§6[Rampage]§7 now immediately grants you regeneration and resistance and causes you to barrel forward, dealing damage and knocking back enemies.

berserkerSignatureRampageChargeRelentles.title: §7When your charge deals damage, you convert your stacks of Exhaustion into Strength.

berserkerSignatureRampageChargeImmob.title:
§7Enemies hit by your charge are also inflicted with Immobilize. 

§f(Immobilize)§7 greatly slows and damages the victim when they attempt to move.

berserkerSignatureBloodthirsty.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Bloodthirsty]§7 
Gain Bloodthirsty for 20s.

§f(Bloodthirsty)§7 grants you 25% of your max health each time you defeat an enemy.

§a25s Cooldown§7

berserkerSignatureBloodthirstyMighty.title:
§7§6[Bloodthirsty]§7 Now grants you Might on use.

§f(Might)§7 grants 25% increased attack damage per stack.

berserkerSignatureBloodthirstyTireless.title: §7While §6[Bloodthirsty]§7 is active, you have a chance to remove stacks of Exhaustion on hit.

berserkerSignatureBloodthirstyTremor.title:
§7While §6[Bloodthirsty]§7 is active, you have a chance to gain Earthshaker on hit.

§f(Earthshaker)§7 causes you to damage and knockback surrounding enemies when landing on the ground. This damage scales with your armor value.

berserkerSignatureBerserking.title:
Signature Ability: 
§6[Berserking]§7 
Sacrifice 30% Total HP. Gain Berserking for a duration equal to the amount of hearts lost.

§f(Berserking)§7 grants you stacking offensive buffs each time you hit an enemy.

§a25s Cooldown§7

berserkerSignatureBerserkingLeap.title: §7§6[Berserking]§7 now causes you to perform a forward leap slam, damaging and knocking back enemies at the landing location.

berserkerSignatureBerserkingLeapImmob.title:
§7Leap Slam now also inflicts enemies with Immobilize.

§f(Immobilize)§7 greatly slows and damages the victim when they attempt to move.

berserkerSignatureBerserkingLeapPull.title: §7Leap Slam now pulls nearby enemies instead of knocking them back.
